items.content_html: 🛠️ Validis - Lightweight Form Validation Library Validis is a fast, minimal, and customizable JavaScript form validation library designed to make form validation seamless and efficient. Whether you're building simple forms or complex input handling, Validis ensures robust validation with an easy-to-use API.

Whether you're building simple forms or complex input handling, Validis ensures robust validation with an easy-to-use API.
